title: 94/1076/EC: Commission Decision of 30 November 1994 amending Decision 92/491/EEC on the clearance of the accounts presented by Italy in respect of the expenditure for 1989 of the EAGGF, Guarantee Section (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 30  November 1994 amending Decision 92/491/EEC on the clearance of the accounts presented by Italy in  respect of the expenditure for 1989 of the EAGGF, Guarantee Section (Only the Italian text is  authentic) (94/1076/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1
The part of the Annex to Decision 92/491/EEC relating to Italy is  replaced by the Annex hereto.

The amount of Lit 426 342 873 600 payable by Italia shall be taken into account as part  of the expenditure referred to in Article 3 of Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2776/88 (5) in  accordance with the following timetable:
- first fortnight of October 1995: Lit 106 585 718 350,
- first fortnight of October 1996: Lit 106 585 718 350,
- first fortnight of October 1997: Lit 106 585 718 350,
- first fortnight of October 1998: Lit 106 585 718 350.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
